lines: !say **BOOM!** 🍄 A Mushroom? explodes and dies, dealing **{dmg}** damage!
!say Your 💛 Absorption is reduced by **{dmg}**! (**{!tag {1} se_id7}** left)
!say Your 💛 Absorption is reduced by **{absorb}**! (**0** left)
!say You have **{!tag {1} hp}/{!tag {1} max_hp}** HP remaining. {!e hp_warn {1}}
